title: Respond to a Negative Online Review
description: A former tenant leaves a negative review about the property management company on Google or Yelp.

tasks.description: Investigate the former tenant's claims by reviewing their file and communication history.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands the context and facts behind the complaint.

tasks.description: Draft a professional and non-confrontational public response to the review, acknowledging the feedback and stating the company's perspective or policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: A well-written public response is drafted.

tasks.description: Post the response online and, if appropriate, offer to discuss the matter offline with the former tenant.
tasks.expected_outcome: The company's response is publicly visible, and an offer for offline resolution is made.
